title: Football shirt possibly 'stadium'
content:
Hi, Im new to this forum. trying to identify the font on this football shirt. think it might be 'stadium' but not sure. could really do with a dropshadow style and one without.   
   
any ideas greatly appreciated   
   
the\_\<body\>   
   
 ![football shirt no. design](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705105659im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/18695.jpg)

 [‹ (x) RES magazine sept/oct issue - Cam {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705105659/http:/typophile.com/node/1710 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Ocean Fresh - custom lettering {Josep Patau Bellart} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705105659/http:/typophile.com/node/1690 "Go to next forum topic")
author: the_body

comments.content:
No matches, but similar stuff:   
   
 [Quadrus](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705105659/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/quadrus/quadrus/testdrive.html?s=SHADED%2010&p=96) | [Buxom](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705105659/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/buxom/ef/testdrive.html?s=SHADED%2010&p=96)   
   
You'll find a bunch of suggestions (without the   
dropshadow style) in [this thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705105659/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/8959.html).
The font is called Princeston, I've also seen it called Pricetown by Corel. Dan

Have you got a sample, Dan? The only thing I found   
at MyFonts is [Princetown](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705105659/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/princetown/), but that's not it.

I have Corel Indiana which looks identical to Princeton by Bay Animation which looks like a clone of Princetown by Letraset. I'm pretty sure there's a solid version of Indiana, but I can't remember which program it came with.   
   
 ![Indiana](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705105659im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/18801.jpg)

My CorelDraw 8 came with a solid version   
called, er, Princetown Solid

This is Princetown D. It came from a CorelDRAW Graphics Suite 11 CD. Info says it's URW ID 6675.   
 ![Princetown D](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705105659im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/18861.jpg)   
   
cheers   
p
